rukus.text: inna nahnu nazzalna ʿalayka l-qur'ana tanzilan
fa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika wala tutiʿ min'hum athiman aw kafuran
wamina al-layli fa-us'jud lahu wasabbih'hu laylan tawilan
inna haulai yuhibbuna l-ʿajilata wayadharuna waraahum yawman thaqilan
nahnu khalaqnahum washadadna asrahum wa-idha shi'na baddalna amthalahum tabdilan
inna hadhihi tadhkiratun faman shaa ittakhadha ila rabbihi sabilan
wama tashauna illa an yashaa l-lahu inna l-laha kana ʿaliman hakiman
yud'khilu man yashau fi rahmatihi wal-zalimina aʿadda lahum ʿadhaban aliman
